item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: TBA Schedule: Monday and Thursday, 11:30 – 12:55 Classroom: TBA Problem sets Problem set 1 (Due: 12.01.2022) Tentative topics Introduction to randomized algorithms: RandQS, Min-Cut, Las vegas & Monte Carlo algorithms Analysis of randomized algorithms: Yaoâ€™s Min-max principle Concentration inequalities: Coupon collector’s problem, Balls and bins, Hashing, Set balancing Probabilistic method, Lovasz Local Lemma, Method of Conditional probabilities Markov chains and Random walks, 2-SAT, 3-SAT, $s\rightsquigarrow t$ connectivity Polynomial Identity testing, Isolation lemma, Mulmuley-Vazirani-Vazirani perfect matching Approximate counting Derandomization techniques & Pseudorandom numbers Number theoretic algorithms: Integer multiplication, Integer factorization, Primality, etc.
